column1: Name / Description

[tut_desc name="How to Create Custom Textures for the Source Engine" desc="This tutorial will show you how to create custom textures for use in creating maps for the Source engine" link="http://lambdageneration.com/modding/source/how-to-create-custom-textures-for-the-source-engine/" /]

[tut_desc name="Basic Re-Skin (62)" desc="This tutorial will cover the basics of reskinning a model for Hammer and HalfLife2." link="http://web.archive.org/web/20060620102748/http://halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=62&PHPSESSID=d50bbc8e15612551d0eb10d5f6efb683" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!hAAjFQ5K!xxiI3X46kVMU21GWleKxGg" /]

[tut_desc name="Texture Basics (64)" desc="This is the first of a series of texturing tutorials from Gronblad, and covers making a texture, and converting it for use in Hammer and HalfLife 2" link="http://web.archive.org/web/20060620102800/http://halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=64&PHPSESSID=d50bbc8e15612551d0eb10d5f6efb683" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!oUwCHYCS!10-Q695R0P3DMDC8XP2iuA" /]

[tut_desc name="Placing Custom Images into a VGUI Menu" desc="This tutorial walks you through creating a material with transparency and then placing it into VGUI menu." link="http://articles.thewavelength.net/662/" /]
[tut_desc name="Creating alpha blending textures." desc="How to create an alpha blending texture." link="http://articles.thewavelength.net/648/" /]

[tut_desc name="Drax's Photoshop Tutorial - User Bars (75)" desc="how to make those User Bars often seen on Forums. " link="http://web.archive.org/web/20060624201145/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=75&PHPSESSID=09c34bedeea9a306d3cf8e9d75122665" /]

[tut_desc name="Drax's Photoshop Tutorial - Pixel Stretch Signatures (76)" desc="how to make a signature for a forum, using pixel stretch technique to give a blurred matching background." link="http://web.archive.org/web/20060624201145/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=76&PHPSESSID=09c34bedeea9a306d3cf8e9d75122665" /]

[tut_desc name="Model Skins - MiniTut" desc="This tutorial is a small introduction to skins." link="http://web.archive.org/web/20060909070319/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=resources&action=view&item=7&PHPSESSID=6807d82da4f7e0ae156f0e88c4864e5f" /]

[tut_desc name="Water Textures by Stadric" desc="Visible representation of water textures" link="http://web.archive.org/web/20141004210343/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=resources&action=view&item=16" /]
[tut_desc name="Surface Materials by Gronblad" desc="Surface Materials for Source" link="http://web.archive.org/web/20080622045705/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=resources&action=view&item=17" /]

[tut_desc name="Animated Textures by Yomother (101)" desc="how to make an animated texture work for you in Half-Life. You will need these programs: Photoshop and VTFEdit" link="http://web.archive.org/web/20080622045725/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=101" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!5UoXybbA!bLNdgSlJuG_nJVmgVvsTbQ" /]

[tut_desc name="Transparent Textures Video by YoMother (129)" desc="How to make a transparent texture." link="http://web.archive.org/web/20150219221231/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=129" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!FBYTHChZ!lMNjAWUMaXEN6IdDKmSuRQ" /]

[tut_desc name="Extracting and editing a source texture by #1Duck (142)" desc="how to extract a texture from the game, and then edit it." link="http://web.archive.org/web/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=142" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!YE5lgAQA!5meXiQYY6wKbywNOV0YYnw" /]

[tut_desc name="Specular Bumpmapping for Textures in Source by Stadric (143)" desc="This tutorial fom Stadric shows how to make textures look more realistic with depth and texture, by specular bumpmapping." link="http://web.archive.org/web/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=143" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!YRYyTY5Q!5eHm_G0B02K9H1y3-N3d7g" /]

[tut_desc name="Blending Textures by Stadric (144)" desc="This shows you how to make a blend texture for use on displacements and was created by Stadric." link="http://web.archive.org/web/20080622045735/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=144" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!JUhWFBTQ!OmUTcJp7avcfg1BoCDtNpQ" /]

[tut_desc name="Create a Spray Decal by Bud Doug Lee (145)" desc="Tutorial on making a spray decal that contains a full range of transparency, such as text or graffiti like used in HL2." link="http://web.archive.org/web/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=145" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!oQJ1WTIT!cdLLq5JwbEAtyMiKMr9FMQ" /]

[tut_desc name="Using GIMP to turn a photograph into a texture with transparency (207)" desc="If I can find a photograph of something similar, it's fairly straightforward to turn it into a texture file. " link="http://web.archive.org/web/20150207141050/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=207" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!4RhV2aoJ!WlvZgTWsBWAatGOWP3u1pg" /]

[tut_desc name="Using GIMP to make self illuminating textures (209)" desc="Using GIMP to make self illuminating textures" link="http://web.archive.org/web/20150207060952/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=209" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!cEwBCQqa!uaFFGUEPJm915AGeCoNbvQ" /]

[tut_desc name="Converting textures with Paint.Net by Last.Exile (211)" desc="How to create textures with Paint .NET and notepad." link="http://web.archive.org/web/http://www.halfwit-2.com/?page=tutorials&id=211" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!YEIUAJYQ!eu8g9d5SqGspuuMX8PJONg" /]

[tut_desc name="Adding Effects to Source Textures" desc="From bump mapping to phong shading - This tutorial covers a large number of texture effects. Look inside to discover how to give your textures an extra special touch." link="https://twhl.info/wiki/page/Tutorial%3A_Adding_Effects_to_Source_Textures" /]

[tut_desc name="Creating blend textures for Displacements" desc="How to painlessly make functional blend textures." link="https://twhl.info/wiki/page/Tutorial%3A_Creating_blend_textures_for_Displacements" download_link="https://mega.nz/#F!MIZiBR7A!2z7sC1gtiQTUngtxw4Z9LQ" /]

[tut_desc name="The Source Spraylogo Tutorial - Introduction" desc="What are source spraylogos? Spraylogos are images you can place on most surfaces in source multiplayer games with the exception of models." link="http://www.the303.org/tutorials/spraylogo.html" /]

[tut_desc name="The Source Spraylogo Tutorial - Creating a Static Spray" desc="Our first tutorial is creating a static spray with no transparency." link="http://www.the303.org/tutorials/tutorial01.html" /]

[tut_desc name="The Source Spraylogo Tutorial - Creating a Static Spray With Transparency" desc="Our second tutorial is creating a static spray with transparency." link="http://www.the303.org/tutorials/tutorial02.html" /]
[tut_desc name="The Source Spraylogo Tutorial - Creating Animated Sprays" desc="Creating Animated Sprays" link="http://www.the303.org/tutorials/tutorial03.html" /]
[tut_desc name="The Source Spraylogo Tutorial - Creating a Fading Spray" desc="Creating a Fading Spray" link="http://www.the303.org/tutorials/tutorial04.html" /]
[tut_desc name="The Source Spraylogo Tutorial - Pixelated Sprite Sprays" desc="Pixelated Sprite Sprays" link="http://www.the303.org/tutorials/tutorial05.html" /]
[tut_desc name="Custom particles in maps & spritesheet VTFs" desc="Custom particles in maps & spritesheet VTFs" link="https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EC8Pn3SmiGQ" /]

[tut_desc name="Custom Textures in HL2 and CS:S" desc="Learn how to use custom textures in HL2 and CS:S." link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/106/Custom_Textures_in_HL2_and_CS:S" /]

[tut_desc name="Creating transparent textures" desc="a pretty simple tutorial on making transparent textures" link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/178/Creating_transparent_textures" /]

[tut_desc name="Learn To Make Normal Maps" desc="In this tutorial you will learn how to create and implent normal maps into your custom source engine textures. Normal maps are textures that make your original texture look 3d. " link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/156/Learn_To_Make_Normal_Maps" /]

[tut_desc name="Customizing/Merging HL2 textures (Fireworks MX)" desc="Merge HL2 textures to create new ones." link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/141/Customizing/Merging_HL2_textures_(Fireworks_MX)" /]
[tut_desc name="Custom Decals with Alpha Maps" desc="Creating your own decals " link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/139/Custom_Decals_with_Alpha_Maps" /]

[tut_desc name="Texture file formats" desc="Guide for texture artists - creating material textures for source" link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/126/Texture_file_formats" /]
[tut_desc name="Converting Wads to HL2" desc="Convert those old wads to HL2 " link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/120/Converting_Wads_to_HL2" /]

[tut_desc name="Specular Bumpmapping with the Source Engine" desc="Some hints for you to manage bumpmapping with your custom textures " link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/107/Specular_Bumpmapping_with_the_Source_Engine" /]
[tut_desc name="lights.rad" desc="Where is it and how do I make one? " link="http://www.snarkpit.net/snarkpower/articles/game/cat/pn/tp/115/lights.rad" /]

[tut_desc name="Your world in HL2" desc="This article gives tips and advice to anyone wanting to make custom photorealistic textures to be used in Half-Life 2." link="https://web.archive.org/web/20061024220650/http://collective.valve-erc.com/index.php?doc=1100776974-36248000" /]
